title: US power bank maker sourcing lithium cells from India amidst US-China trade war
description: India's electronics manufacturing industry is benefiting from the US-China tariff war. Anker will source one million lithium-ion cells per month from the Munouth group's Andhra Pradesh facility starting the second quarter of 2025. This shift is due to a 25% U…
content: The US-China tariff war is already proving to be beneficial to Indias electronics manufacturing industry. Following Apples shift away from China to turn India into the second-largest iPhone producer,… [+3188 chars]
summary: India's electronics manufacturing industry is benefiting from the US-China tariff war . Anker will source one million lithium-ion cells per month from the Munouth group's Andhra Pradesh facility starting the second quarter of 2025 . This shift is due to a 25% U.S. tariff war, which is expected to hit the electronics manufacturing sector in the second half of the next three quarters of the year . The 25% tariff war is set to hit electronics manufacturing in India's manufacturing sector .
